paymentDescription: You can pay for your order in cash, by bank card or online upon receipt
After clicking the 'Checkout' button, you will be redirected to the GooglePay payment service page to make the payment
After clicking the 'Checkout' button, you will be redirected to the ApplePay payment service page to make the payment
After placing your order, you will be redirected to the secure payment system page where you can make the payment
